column5: This airy suite located invites you to curl up with a good book or snooze the day away. Located on the second floor, the room has original wood floors, comfy queen bed, soft linens. A houseful of charm is yours to enjoy in this expansive historic colonial style home. Nested on an acre of trees and across from a beautiful city park, we are just one mile from historic downtown Bryan and 10 minutes from Texas A&M. Be sure to see our other listings. All of our guests rooms combined can accommodate up to 8 guests.
